name: Frank H.J. Du
label: Technical Program Manager/Business Development Executive
summary: An average guy building businesses with code (mostly JS and Python). On a journey to help companies to digitize global trade and embrace digital transformation.

work.summary: Swiftify is a SaaS (Software-as-a-service) based digital solution that enables you to manage and digitize your international trade flow: sourcing, procurement, logistics and more at efficiency.

highlights: Design and develop internal Python components focusing on modularity, code readability, reusability, and developer friendliness.
Design, develop and deploy advanced RPA(Robotic Process Automation) solutions that address real business operation challenges.
Design RESTful API with Flask: focusing on abstracting away complex Python and RPA functionalities into the reusable API entry points to power large data delivery projects.

work.summary: FMCG sourcing, merchandising, logsitics and key account management
Enabled a collaborative FMCG supply chain, developed and maintained a strategic supply landscape rendering quality, availability and a gross profit margin at a 5% approximation.
highlights: Partially managing existing vendor base, exploring and establishing new suppliers network.
Utilizing G Suite(Google Apps) to design, optimize and digitize the goods purchase flows that improved the company’s internal purchasing efficiency and productivity.

Serving as the front-end person of the company working with the established supply network to propel transaction efficiency, determine new procurement opportunities, update purchasing policies and customize procurement processes that fit bilaterally for every individual vendor.

work.summary: developed a more diversified and resourceful upstream suppliers portfolio for strategically important FMCG brands
highlights: Initiate, oversee and conclude Procure-to-Pay cycle in a timely, secure and effective manner in favor of company's terms and conditions.
Plan and implement sourcing strategies for several specific FMCG brands along with purchasing director.
Raw web pricing data collection, importing, preprocessing and cleaning for pricing strategies and profit margin projection.

work.summary: Enhanced the company’s financial resilience for it not having to purchase bulky inventories. Expressly, I worked with upstream vendors to implement a drop shipping business line whereby vendors deliver the ordered items on behalf of the company to the customers without them being purchased in advance.

projects.name: YouTube Channel for Python Programming Tutorials
projects.summary: Channel launched in January 2019, where I serve as the instructor and content creator to teach Python and coding. Averagely, the channel is gaining 2 - 3 new subscribers weekly.
